pages.text: Some blocks and items have been renamed to prevent content overlap and to distinguish between them. Here's a list for your convenience.$(br2)$(italics)Keep these in mind if you happen to need to report a bug to the mod author.

$(li)Quark Candles - Tallow Candles$(li)Quark Limestone - Chalk$(li)BuzzierBees Candles - Wax Candles$(li)DarkUtils Powders - Earthly, Hellish, Ender$(li)SGems Rose Quartz - Pink Quartz$(li)Botania Redquartz- Scarlet Quartz$(li)Quark Pipe - Simple Pipe$(li)Rats Cheese - Swiss Cheese$(li)Angel Ring - Angelic Halo$(li)Create Blueprints - Schematic Blueprint
$(li)EnderChests - Public Ender Chest$(li)Vanilla Ender Chest - Personal Ender Chest$(li)Swamp Expansion Rice - Millet$(li)Inspirations Pipe - Duct
